Name: Debra Forte
Description:
Debra was stabbed to death by Michael Thompson on May 15, 1995 in Haverhill. She suffered multiple six-inch stab wounds to the chest, any of which would have been sufficient to kill her and was also beaten about the head and shoulders. 

Thompson pleaded guilty to 2nd degree murder, and received a life sentence with parole in 15 years.
